name: Rags to Liches
description:
Rags to Liches is a small, third-person, action, tower defense game where you play as a peasant who gets tired of adventurers breaking into his house. Place down towers and fight off waves and waves of "enemies." Progress through the story and see just how far one man will go to protect his beloved llama.

Features

  • 5 Levels
  • 4 Tower types
  • Endless Mode
  • Keyboard RGB
If you find any bugs, please let us know.
We hope you enjoy this game we made in 10 weeks.
